item.title: How do i use some of these basic functions
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Don’y use variables ‘x’ or ‘y.’ For some reason SRL uses them as a global variable (noobs)

Do this:

program New;
{.in....}
var
  Ax, Ay: integer;
...

Read full topic
item.source: How do i use some of these basic functions

item.title: How do i use some of these basic functions
item.dc:creator: @traitors traitors
item.description:
@traitors wrote:

OK im a semi good scar scripter but i have never use SRL and i have just started.heres what is in my script

program New; {.include SRL/SRL.scar} {.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar} var x,y :integer; begin FindMSColor(50,800,4696903); end.

i get this error
Line 5: [Error] (9067:1): Duplicate identifier ‘x’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\BOB.scar

what am i doing wrong.please be specific and give correct example

Read full topic
